name: zero-styled
description: trying to make a CSS-in-JS library that combines the best of utility first and zero-runtime CSS extraction for blazing-fast performance

scripts.start: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && babel src --out-dir dist --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --config-file ./babel.config.cjs && node dist/index.js
scripts.start:jsx: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && babel src --out-dir dist --copy-files --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --config-file ./babel.config.cjs && node dist/index.js
